attributes.action: Re-instate the death penalty for serial killers, serial rapists, terrorism, child molesters and child murderers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Where's the justice to the victims and the victims families when some of the people who commit these crimes are elegable to be released before they die? Why are us tax payers paying to house these animals for all these years? 10 years until the offender is killed is long enough for the offender to appeal his or her innocence. If found guilty, death it shall be.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
